verses.verse: Unto you <WH430>, O God, do we give thanks <WH3034>, unto you do we give thanks <WH3034>: for that your name <WH8034> is near <WH7138> your wondrous works <WH6381> declare <WH5608>.
When I shall receive <WH3947> the congregation <WH4150> I will judge <WH8199> uprightly <WH4339>.
The earth <WH776> and all the inhabitants <WH3427> there are dissolved <WH4127>: I carry up <WH8505> the pillars <WH5982> of it <WH5542>. Selah.
I said <WH559> unto the fools <WH1984>, Deal not foolishly <WH1984>: and to the wicked <WH7563>, Lift not up <WH7311> the horn <WH7161>:
Lift not up <WH7311> your horn <WH7161> on high <WH4791>: speak <WH1696> not with a stiff <WH6277> neck <WH6677>.
For promotion <WH7311> comes neither from the east <WH4161>, nor from the west <WH4628>, nor from the south <WH4057>.
But God <WH430> is the judge <WH8199>: he puts down <WH8213> one <WH7311>, and sets up another.

For in the hand <WH3027> of the Lord <WH3068> there is a cup <WH3563>, and the wine <WH3196> is red <WH2560>; it is full <WH4392> of mixture <WH4538>; and he pours out <WH5064> of the same <WH2088>: but the dregs <WH8105> there <WH7563>, all the wicked of the earth <WH776> shall wring them out <WH4680>, and drink them <WH8354>.
But I will declare <WH5046> for ever <WH5769>; I will sing praises <WH2167> to the God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290>.
All the horns <WH7161> of the wicked <WH7563> also will I cut off <WH1438>; but the horns <WH7161> of the righteous <WH6662> shall be exalted <WH7311>.
